All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BadAttributeValueException
Exception for signaling attribute validations
ConnectionRunner
connection class fo managing connections to the node
DownloadRunner
The downloadRunner class which implements the ability to receive file IDs after an established connection and send out the file contents if it exists
DownloadService
This class is used to establish receiving incoming download connections The instance of it starts by being called within the class Node and remains running until the Node class terminates, ending the connections the serverSocket within download service if they exist and the node's ability to receive requests for download connections
ErrorType
Enum class for the error types within answer request messages
Message
Represents message instance
Message
message class for the MetANode implementation
MessageInput
Deserialization input source for only general methods for parsing
MessageOutput
Serialization output source for only general methods for output
MessageTest
All tests for the Message class
MessageType
Enum class for detailing the possible message type for the class
MetANodeMessageTest
 
Node
Node class for processing user input and thread actions
NodeF1
F1 node in Network test
NodeF2
F2 node in Network test
NodeF3
F3 node in Network test
NodeMulti
Test handling multi searches and response: Get N searches Send N responses intermixed with N searches Get N responses
NodeNonMatch
Test handling non-match response: Send search Receive non-matching and then matching response
NodeOrder
Test handling response order: Receive search and send response Send correct searches Receive response in reverse order of searches
NodeOrderNonMatch
Test combination of reverse response order and non-matching response
ReceiveRunner
ReceiveRunner class which implements runnable to decode Response and Search objects to the socket
Response
Represents a response instance
Result
Represents a single search result
ResultTest
Testing for all result test cases
RoutingService
routing service
Search
Represents a search
SenderRunner
SenderRunner class which implements runnable to encode Response and Search objects to the socket
